original_text: So Gideon, and the hundred men that were with him, came unto the outside of the camp in the beginning of the middle watch; and they had but newly set the watch: and they blew the trumpets, and brake the pitchers that were in their hands.
korean_text: 기드온과 그와 함께 한 백 명이 이경 초에 진영 근처에 이른즉 바로 파수꾼들을 교대한 때라 그들이 나팔을 불며 손에 가졌던 항아리를 부수니라

sentences.original_text: So Gideon, and the hundred men that were with him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 기드온과 그와 함께 있던 백 명의 사람은

sentences.original_text: came unto the outside of the camp
in the beginning of the middle watch;
and they had but newly set the watch:
